name: ListWebhookEventTypes
description:
Retrieve all webhook event types available for subscription.

This tool is used to fetch a list of all available webhook event types that can be subscribed to. It helps users identify which events they can set up webhooks for in order to receive notifications.

parameters.name: api_version_for_event_types
parameters.description: Specify the API version to list event types, overriding the default version.

value_schema.description: The API version for which to list event types. Setting this field overrides the default version used by the application.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: api_version
parameters.description: The API version for which to list event types. Setting this field overrides the default version used by the application.

value_schema.description: The API version for which to list event types. Setting this field overrides the default version used by the application.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
